title: Leftwards Pushing Hand Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Pushing Hand Left Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a hand pushing towards the left, often indicating rejection, stopping, or a boundary. The light skin tone specifies the individual using the gesture.
apple_vendor_description: The leftwards pushing hand emoji, depicted with a light skin tone on Apple devices, is a dynamic gesture with a clear sense of forward motion. Its smooth, rounded fingers and subtle 3D shading, characteristic of Apple‚Äôs design, convey a gentle yet firm push or rejection. This emoji is frequently used on Apple devices to indicate turning away from something, disagreeing, or politely declining an offer.
